name: Depth Kid (4th Alakajam)
description:
A short platformer where you play as a kid who jumped into a deep pit.

You've got weak little legs, so you can't jump that high, but you can throw yourself forward!

Z to jump

X to dive

Also, the game doesn't  save your progress if you close it (yet). 

There are downloads for a version with music and a version without music.

Have fun!
